public.headline: Build Better Together
public.valueProposition: Pages is your all-in-one workspace for teams. Organize projects, share ideas, and bring your vision to life with powerful collaboration tools.
public.everythingYouNeed: Everything you need to collaborate and succeed
public.lightningFastDescription: Built for speed and performance. Experience seamless collaboration without any lag or delays.
public.teamCollaborationDescription: Work together in real-time with your team. Share ideas, assign tasks, and stay in sync.
public.securePrivateDescription: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security. Privacy and safety are our top priorities.
public.flexibleWorkspaceDescription: Organize your work the way you want. Customize layouts, views, and workflows to fit your needs.
public.description: Your all-in-one workspace for teams. Collaborate, create, and succeed together.

header.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
header.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your team. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for small teams and personal projects

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: For growing teams that need more

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: For established teams needing advanced features

business.name: Business
business.description: For large organizations with complex needs

comparison.title: Compare Plans
comparison.description: See how features differ across plans

changePlans.question: Can I change plans later?
changePlans.answer: Yes! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

discounts.question: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
discounts.answer: Yes! Annual plans save you 20% compared to monthly billing. This discount is automatically applied when you choose annual billing.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and support payments via bank transfer for Enterprise plans.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! All paid plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. You can explore all features risk-free.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all annual plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 30 days for a full refund.

exceedLimits.question: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
exceedLimits.answer: We'll notify you when you approach your limits. You can upgrade your plan at any time to continue using Pages without interruption.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Our team is here to help you find the perfect plan for your needs.

header.title: Everything You Need to Build Better Together
header.subtitle: Pages combines powerful project management and documentation tools in one seamless platform.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of teams already using Pages to build better together.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Powerful tools to organize, track, and manage your projects.

issueTracking.title: Issue Tracking
issueTracking.description: Create, assign, and track issues with custom workflows.

details.customTypes: Custom issue types (Task, Bug, Story, Epic)

agileBoards.title: Agile Boards
agileBoards.description: Scrum and Kanban boards for flexible project management.

workflows.title: Workflows
workflows.description: Customizable workflows to match your team's processes.

reporting.title: Reporting & Analytics
reporting.description: Real-time insights into your project's progress.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Create, organize, and collaborate on documentation.

richTextEditor.title: Rich Text Editor
richTextEditor.description: Powerful editor with formatting, media, and collaboration.

pageHierarchy.title: Page Hierarchy
pageHierarchy.description: Organize pages in a flexible tree structure.

advancedSearch.title: Advanced Search
advancedSearch.description: Find anything instantly across your workspace.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Work together with comments, mentions, and notifications.

platformFeatures.title: Platform Features
platformFeatures.description: Everything you need to scale your team and organization.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with the tools your team already uses.

mobileApps.title: Mobile Apps
mobileApps.description: Access your work on the go with native mobile apps.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Lightning-fast performance, even with large workspaces.
